## Why You Need This Sink Strainer

This stainless steel sink strainer is a must-have for every kitchen. Here’s why:

- **High-Quality Material**: Made from robust 304 stainless steel, this strainer promises durability and longevity. No more rust or corrosion!
- **Perfect Fit**: Designed to fit seamlessly in sinks ranging from 78 to 84MM. A great fit ensures it stays in place, effectively filtering debris.
- **Multi-Functional**: It’s not just a strainer. It also acts as a water stopper, making it perfect for various sink tasks.
- **Easy to Clean**: Simply lift it out and give it a rinse. It’s that easy!
